name: Pruyze
startIntroPart2: I, representative from Pruyze wants every nation to be peace. We all wish that we can get along well
defeated: Nearby future, you will be defeated from your gruesome acts that deserves hell upon you forever.
introduction: Hello, I am a representative from Pruyze and would hope that we'll get along well and achieve profit together.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.

name: Sylveria
declaringWar: Today, the great nation of Sylveria has declared war against you, not because we are afraid or threatened, but because we seek to prove our martial might and test our courage in battle. We declare this war for the thrill of it, and for the glory, excitement, and honor that come with it. Let us prove ourselves on the world stage, and let our enemies tremble in fear at the very sound of our name.
attacked: How surprising, another attack on our nation. It's almost as if our enemies can't leave us alone and enjoy their own peace and prosperity.
defeated: With a heavy heart, I admit to the defeat of our nation in this war. Our enemy has proven too strong and too determined, and despite our best efforts, we must concede and accept the terms of surrender.
introduction: Well, look at you. What a quaint little nation you have there, not quite as grand as ours. It must be a challenge leading such a miniscule group of people. I'm surprised your land can even support such a population. Oh well, who am I to judge?
neutralHello: Hello, small fry. Oh, I meant hello, you insignificant little insect. Do I have the pleasure of addressing the leader of this insufferable little nation?
neutralLetsHearIt: You better have a good reason for wasting our time.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniques: [-50]% Gold cost of acquiring tiles [in all cities]
[+35]% Production when constructing [Culture] wonders [in all cities]

name: Cynoc
startIntroPart2: Well, it looks like we found another. Hello, we come in peace.
declaringWar: Please don't resist. Make this easy for us. Nothing personal.
attacked: Are you sure you want to do this?
neutralNo: I'm afraid I would have to disagree.
Simply, I cannot agree with you.
hateLetsHearIt: Don't expect me to agree with you so easily, but continue.
hateYes: You'll have to do better than that, but I'll try and give you a chance.
afterPeace: Thank you, I'm glad you have ceased.
tradeRequest: We would like to trade. Would this barter be acceptable?

name: Marley
startIntroPart2: Remember, no witnesses. I mean, hello, we come in peace!
declaringWar: 'It is an eyesore to see you prosper, I shall destabillize you.'
defeated: I'm about to shove some stuff up your asshole!
introduction: I hope you cease from existence
hateLetsHearIt: You got 5 minutes, 10 if I'm in the mood.
Whatever you're saying will enter my left ear and will go out my right one, but I'll hear you out anyway.
hateNo: What the f--- did you just say?
F--- off, you massive collosal cuntasaurus
You're a traitor to the Marleyan Empire!
hateYes: You better be right on this. If not, I will summon the citizen of the Marleyan Empire to c-- on your corpse!
This better be a good decision.
afterPeace: Thank you, finally! Took you long enough, Jesus
tradeRequest: Got something that might interest ya!

name: Yafroisia
declaringWar: Let our foes tremble in fear at the might of our nation.
attacked: Let us show our neighbors the price of standing against the power of our nation.
defeated: Let us retreat for now, and strategize for our return and victory.
introduction: We welcome our new neighbors with open arms. And we look forward to forming a long-lasting bond.
neutralHello: Greetings and welcome to the great Sultanate of Yafroisia.
neutralLetsHearIt: What is on your mind, good ruler?
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.

name: Fluobar
declaringWar: Together, we shall overthrow the evil rulers and reclaim our freedom.
attacked: Let us stand strong and fight back, and let our leaders know that we shall not waver in the face of adversity.
defeated: It wasn't supposed to end this way.
introduction: We hope to establish friendly relations with you, and work together for a better future.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
